Short_Description: Synthetic tetrapeptide for cellular aging and telomere research
Full_Description: Epitalon is a synthetic tetrapeptide compound (ala-glu-asp-gly) developed by vladimir khabarov and studied for its potential role in cellular aging and telomere maintenance processes. Research applications include investigations into telomere length modulation, cellular senescence delay, pineal gland function, melatonin secretion regulation, and aging-related gene expression in experimental models.
SEO_Title: Buy Epitalon 10mg Research Peptide – Vici Peptides
SEO_Description: High-purity Epitalon 10mg research peptide available for laboratory research use only from Vici Peptides. Synthetic tetrapeptide for cellular aging and telomere research
Temperature_Storage: Store lyophilized powder at 2-8°C in airtight, light-blocking containers
Shipping_Restrictions: Ships to verified research institutions only
Research_Applications: Epitalon is used in laboratory research to investigate cellular aging mechanisms and telomere maintenance. Research applications include studies on telomere length modulation, cellular senescence delay, pineal gland function, melatonin secretion regulation, and aging-related gene expression in experimental models. The compound has been investigated for its potential effects on lifespan extension and age-related disease processes in laboratory settings.
Storage_Requirements: Store lyophilized powder at 2-8°C in airtight, light-blocking containers. Protect from light, air, and moisture. Reconstituted solution should be stored at 4°C for up to 14 days. Maintain sterile conditions during reconstitution.
Handling_Guidelines: Handle using sterile techniques and appropriate laboratory personal protective equipment (PPE). Use in well-ventilated areas. Avoid inhalation, ingestion, or skin contact. Follow standard laboratory safety protocols. Refer to Material Safety Data Sheet (MSDS) for complete safety information.

Short_Description: Mitochondrially derived peptide for metabolic research
Full_Description: Mots-c (mitochondrially derived peptide) is a 16-amino acid peptide encoded within the mitochondrial 12s ribosomal rna gene. Research applications include investigations into metabolic regulation, insulin sensitivity, glucose homeostasis, mitochondrial function, and age-related metabolic disorders in experimental models.
Synonyms: Mitochondrial ORF of the Twelve S rRNA-c, MOTS-c, Humanin-related peptide

Short_Description: Essential coenzyme for cellular metabolism and energy production research
Full_Description: Nicotinamide adenine dinuclectide (nad+) is a coenzyme found in all living cells that plays a critical role in cellular metabolism, energy production, and dna repair mechanisms. Research applications include investigations into cellular aging, mitochondrial function, sirtuin activation, dna repair pathways, and metabolic regulation in experimental models.
Synonyms: Nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide, NAD, Coenzyme I, DPN
SEO_Title: Buy NAD+ 100mg Research Peptide – Vici Peptides
SEO_Description: High-purity NAD+ 100mg research peptide available for laboratory research use only from Vici Peptides. Essential coenzyme for cellular metabolism and energy production research
Temperature_Storage: Store lyophilized powder at -20°C in a dry environment
Shipping_Restrictions: Ships to verified research institutions only
Research_Applications: NAD+ is used in laboratory research to investigate cellular metabolism, energy production, and aging mechanisms. Research applications include studies on sirtuin activation, mitochondrial function, DNA repair pathways, cellular senescence, metabolic regulation, and age-related disease processes in experimental models. The coenzyme is essential for numerous cellular processes including glycolysis, oxidative phosphorylation, and DNA repair.
Storage_Requirements: Store lyophilized powder at -20°C in a dry environment. Protect from light, air, and moisture. Reconstituted solution should be stored at 4°C and used promptly. Maintain sterile conditions during reconstitution.
Handling_Guidelines: Handle using sterile techniques and appropriate laboratory personal protective equipment (PPE). Use in well-ventilated areas. Avoid inhalation, ingestion, or skin contact. NAD+ is sensitive to light and should be protected from direct exposure. Follow standard laboratory safety protocols. Refer to Material Safety Data Sheet (MSDS) for complete safety information.

Short_Description: Neurotrophic peptide preparation for neurological research
Full_Description: Cerebrolysin is a neurotrophic peptide preparation derived from porcine brain tissue, containing neurotrophic factors including brain-derived neurotrophic factor (bdnf), nerve growth factor (ngf), and other neurotrophic peptides. Research applications include investigations into neuroprotection, neuronal plasticity, synaptic function, cognitive function, and neurodegenerative disease processes in experimental models.
Synonyms: Cerebrolysin, Brain-derived neurotrophic factors, Neurotrophic peptide complex

Research_Applications: Cerebrolysin is used in laboratory research to investigate neuroprotection and neuronal plasticity. Research applications include studies on cognitive function, synaptic plasticity, neurogenesis, stroke recovery, traumatic brain injury, Alzheimer's disease, and other neurodegenerative conditions in experimental models.
Storage_Requirements: Store at 2-8°C. Protect from light and freezing. Do not freeze. Maintain sterile conditions. Use within expiration date.
Handling_Guidelines: Handle using sterile techniques and appropriate laboratory personal protective equipment (PPE). Use in well-ventilated areas. Avoid inhalation, ingestion, or skin contact. Short_Description: Tripeptide antioxidant for oxidative stress research
Full_Description: Glutathione is a tripeptide antioxidant compound (glutamyl-cysteinyl-glycine) found in all living cells. Research applications include investigations into oxidative stress, cellular detoxification, antioxidant defense mechanisms, immune function, and age-related oxidative damage in experimental models.

Shipping_Restrictions: Ships to verified research institutions only
Research_Applications: Glutathione is used in laboratory research to investigate oxidative stress and cellular detoxification. Research applications include studies on antioxidant defense mechanisms, cellular redox balance, immune function, liver detoxification, age-related oxidative damage, and protection against reactive oxygen species in experimental models.
